title: Should listen to FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED java deltas
description: The current behavior is to fire a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta when the attached source of a jar is changed. This is incorrect as it should be firing a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta instead. As a result, the UI reacts by closing the class file editors that are open on the jar. However, when attempting to fix the delta to be a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta, the UI does not respond.
OB: Currently, when the attached source of a jar is changed, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired.
EB: When the attached source of a jar is changed, a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) java delta should be fired to update the class file editor. The FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH delta should be removed once this bug is fixed.
SR: To fix this bug, the code should be modified to correctly fire a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) java delta when the attached source of a jar is changed.
